summary: The American Tooacco Company was founded in 1994 in Stamford, Connecticut. The company is now called Clarion Mardeting and Communications. It is based in Detroit, Michigan, but has offices in New York and Washington, D.C. In 1994, the company issued a $69,400.00 invoices.
